attributes.action: Deport The Evil Extremist ABU QATADA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This evil Terrorist is out roaming the streets of London just weeks after being freed from jail and placed under "House Arrest". The Hate Preacher branded Bin Ladens Al-Qaeda deputy in Europe, Walked Freely along a London street on Monday - The Third anniversary of the 7/7 suicide bombings in the capital, I therefore ask the Prime Minister to Deport This Evil Person. why is the government allowing this sick person to stay in our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
